books.title: The Great Gatsby
books.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
books.description: A classic novel about the American Dream and the Roaring Twenties

books.title: To Kill a Mockingbird
books.author: Harper Lee
books.description: A story about racial injustice and moral growth in the American South

books.title: The Shining
books.author: Stephen King
books.description: A family becomes caretakers of a haunted hotel, leading to terrifying consequences

books.title: The Lord of the Rings
books.author: J.R.R. Tolkien
books.description: An epic fantasy adventure about the battle between good and evil in Middle-earth

books.title: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
books.author: J.K. Rowling
books.description: A young boy discovers he is a wizard and begins his journey at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry

books.title: It
books.author: Stephen King
books.description: A group of friends confronts a shape-shifting evil that preys on children in their small town

books.title: The Hobbit
books.author: J.R.R. Tolkien
books.description: A hobbit named Bilbo Baggins embarks on an unexpected adventure to reclaim a treasure from a dragon

books.title: Dracula
books.author: Bram Stoker
books.description: The classic tale of the vampire Count Dracula and his quest to spread his curse to England

books.title: Frankenstein
books.author: Mary Shelley
books.description: A scientist creates a living being from dead tissue, with terrifying consequences

books.title: The Chronicles of Narnia: The Lion, the Witch and the Wardrobe
books.author: C.S. Lewis
books.description: Four siblings discover a magical wardrobe that leads to the enchanted land of Narnia

books.title: A Game of Thrones
books.author: George R.R. Martin
books.description: The first book in the epic fantasy series about power struggles in the Seven Kingdoms

books.title: The Silence of the Lambs
books.author: Thomas Harris
books.description: An FBI trainee seeks the help of a brilliant psychiatrist and cannibalistic serial killer to catch another killer

books.author: George Orwell
books.description: A dystopian novel about a totalitarian society where individualism is suppressed

books.title: Pride and Prejudice
books.author: Jane Austen
books.description: A classic romance novel about the Bennet sisters and their quest for love and marriage

books.title: The Da Vinci Code
books.author: Dan Brown
books.description: A symbologist and cryptologist uncover a conspiracy involving the Catholic Church and the Holy Grail
